name: egg_tandem_hunter
summary: Uses per target coverage files from Picard to calculate fold changes in specific exons for the detection of presumptive PTDs

inputSpec.name: coverage_files
inputSpec.label: Query coverage_file/s
inputSpec.help: Per target coverage file containing exon coordinates and normalised coverage values (pertarget_coverage.tsv)

inputSpec.name: intervals
inputSpec.label: JSON file
inputSpec.help: JSON file containing containing intervals to compare coverage at (.json)

inputSpec.name: advanced_options
inputSpec.label: Advanced command line options
inputSpec.help: Advanced command line options that will be supplied directly to TandemHunter execution.

inputSpec.name: run
inputSpec.label: run name
inputSpec.help: run name to prefix output .xlsx file

outputSpec.name: comparison_csv
outputSpec.label: csv files with TandemHunter outputs per sample (.cvg_comparison.csv)

outputSpec.name: comparison_csv.xlsx
outputSpec.label: output single .xlsx file with TandemHunter output (.cvg_comparison.csv)
